JobFullDesc: About the Role:The Uber for Business team partners with public and private sector around the world to build more efficient, accessible, and equitable through our product offerings. We are looking for a sharp, highly motivated individual to run responses to Requests for Proposals (RFPs) and other government solicitations, start to finish. This role requires a diverse set of skills, including detailed writing, project management, and public speaking. The ideal candidate has strong attention to detail and is a fast paced teammate who is excited to partner with internal and external stakeholders to develop and pitch solutions that will improve the customer experience. Are you up for the challenge?What You’ll Do:Analyze RFP documents to review opportunities, evaluate product fit, and develop response strategiesBuild and implement project plans, aligning teams in support of proposal needs and timelineCompile and write portions of proposals including project descriptions, descriptions of services, cover letters, resumes, etc.Design or coordinate the design of high-quality visuals and narrativesMaintain a proposal response library and assist in the creation of contentCollaborate with Sales and Product teams to ensure offerings are competitive and up to dateAttend pre-proposal and post-award meetings, demos, and press eventsAct as an advocate for private and public sector customers, learning their needs and ensuring internal teams are building the right products to address those needsDeliver winning proposals that are accurate, vetted, and compellingBasic Qualifications:Bachelor's degree4 years of professional experiencePreferred Qualifications:Proven experience in project management, technical writing/editing, permit/grant writing, or similar; B2B and government procurement experience is highly preferredSuperb writing and editing skills; the ability to clearly communicate complex ideas to a wide range of business partners with a concise, detailed, creative, and persuasive styleA high level of organization and attention to detail; you'll be encouraged to produce quality, accurate work in a fast paced environmentAbility to work with and get consensus from cross-functional teamsAn owner's mentality; able to tackle whatever work is needed for your team to accomplish its goalExperience with the Google Suite and Salesforce; graphic design skills a plusAble to meet federal government security requirementsApplicants will be required to submit one or more writing samples.
